pr_title: Use CGroup CPU usage when present

timeline.message: Use CGroup CPU usage when present

timeline.bodyText: If we take usage from cgroup, we should take limit from cgroup also.
timeline.author: ivankelly

replies.bodyText: The available processors reported by JVM are already taking the limit from cgroups.
replies.author: merlimat

replies.bodyText:
@ivankelly  Yes, actually, the availableProcessor is capped to discrete CPU units, so we could read fractional CPU quotas from cgoup.
Updated here, PTAL again.
replies.author: merlimat

timeline.message: Also read cpu limits from cgroups

timeline.bodyText: log.error("Failed to read CPU usage from {}", CGROUPS_CPU_USAGE_PATH, e);
